data.message:
I'm facin the room like a Salvador Dali painting.. And if my music speaks, I hope it would let the world see, how mushrooms smile at me behind a cloud of xtc.. And next to me.. You find the quen of endless dreaming about that ocean of alcohol and that snow moutain.. Wile my soul is coutin,,
I see the tresure in her eyes and I always thought that she was my Savior, but she fades away every time I'm trying to embrase her
